title: The Hunt

awardEventDetails.title: 2014 Nominee Oscar
awardEventDetails.for: Best Foreign Language Film of the Year

awardEventDetails.title: 2013 Nominee BAFTA Film Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Film not in the English Language
awardEventDetails.description: Thomas Vinterberg - Sisse Graum Jørgensen - Morten Kaufmann

awardEventDetails.title: 2015 Nominee IOFCP Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Actor in a Leading Role

awardEventDetails.title: 2014 Winner FIPRESCI Prize
awardEventDetails.description: Mads Mikkelsen (Mads Mikkelsen's powerful yet minimalist performance in Thomas Vinterberg's The Hunt, as a school teacher wrongly cast out by his community, brings exceptional depth and dimension to bear on an enigmatic figure. The actor finds the humanity, and the contradictions, in his character, bringing a sense of balance and honesty to a tale riddled with injustice and lies.)

awardEventDetails.title: 2014 Nominee Silver Condor
awardEventDetails.for: Best Foreign Film, Not in the Spanish Language (Mejor Película Extranjera)

awardEventDetails.title: 2014 Nominee ICS Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Film Not in the English Language

awardEventDetails.title: 2014 Winner CinEuphoria
awardEventDetails.description: Thomas Vinterberg (producer & director) - Sisse Graum Jørgensen (producer) - Morten Kaufmann (producer)

awardEventDetails.title: 2012 Winner Vulcain Prize for the Technical Artist
2012 Winner Prize of the Ecumenical Jury
awardEventDetails.description: Thomas Vinterberg (In "The Hunt", Lucas, an inherently good man becomes the target of a community torn apart by lies, manipulation and betrayal ; where he continually fights for his lost friendship's, forgiveness and reputation. Thomas Vinterberg's direction gives us a strong statement: showing us a new way of looking at modern society where men and children are concerned; things are not always what they seem!)

awardEventDetails.title: 2012 Nominee European Film Award
awardEventDetails.description: Thomas Vinterberg - Morten Kaufmann - Sisse Graum Jørgensen
